title: Kylie Jenner says she's accepted her stretch marks as a 'gift' from baby Stormi
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner says she's finally accepted her stretch marks by thinking of them as "a little gift" from her baby girl Stormi.

The lip kit billionaire, 22, welcomed her daughter in February last year, with now-ex Travis Scott.

She said she'd always wanted to be a young mum, and told fans she's accepted the changes pregnancy made to her body.

In a question and answer session with her fans, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star opened up about accepting her post-pregnancy body.

One fan asked her: "was it hard getting back in shape after your pregnancy?"

Sharing an adorable picture of herself in a yellow bikini and hugging little Stormi, she said: "I snapped back pretty fast but it was never the same and still isn't!

(Image: Instagram)

"Once i accepted the change my confidence came back. It just takes time"

Another follower asked: "Did you have any stretch marks during your pregnancy? If so how did you get rid of them?"

Kylie said: "On my breasts, butt, and thighs! I haven't gotten rid of them. Just accepted them as a little gift from Stormi lol."

Another fan was dying to know what Kylie's favourite part of being pregnant was.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The star responded: "Nothing more special than feeling your baby move and grow"

During the Q&A, Kylie also revealed the surprisingly normal second name choice she had for Stormi, and hinted she could still use it.

She was asked: "What are other names you considered naming Stormi?"

Kylie answered: "Rose i still love that name.."

(Image: Kylie Jenner/Instagram)

Her answer seemed to suggest she could end up using the name if she has another daughter.

And after taking to motherhood like a duck to water, fans will be hoping to see her welcome another child one day.

Kylie and Travis recently split, and have both spoken out to deny cheating on each other after rumours emerged.

description: The lip kit billionaire welcomed baby Stormi in February, last year, and says she's grown to accept the changes to her body
